title: Tears in the Rubble
description: ﻿Layla Swanson is terrified of getting stuck in Hollow Oaks. She’s made a plan. Graduate her tiny high school.Go to college. Away from home.Get her dream job.She’s devoted her high school career to making sure she reaches those goals. Graduation is right around the corner. A chance meeting leads her down a road she never imagined.Layla’s faced with the one person who could stand in the way of her dreams. Taylor Scott. Her childhood best friend. Despite the years since they’ve been close he still knows her better than anyone else. Something long forgotten flares life between them.Now, Layla must choose between her longtime plan to get away from Hollow Oaks and the one who’s captured her heart.
author: Britni Hill
